pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Thursday, October 15, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will host a call with provincial and territorial premiers.

10:20 a.m. The Prime Minister, Premier of Nunavut Joe Savikataaq, and Minister of Northern Affairs Dan Vandal will participate in a virtual tour of the Young Hunters Program at the Aqqiumavvik Society in Arviat, Nunavut.

11:20 a.m. The Prime Minister, Premier of the Northwest Territories Caroline Cochrane, Minister of Northern Affairs Dan Vandal, and Member of Parliament for Northwest Territories Michael McLeod, will participate in a virtual roundtable on housing in Indigenous and Northern communities with stakeholders from the Northwest Territories.

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister, Premier of Yukon Sandy Silver, Minister of Northern Affairs Dan Vandal, and Member of Parliament for Yukon Larry Bagnell will participate in a virtual roundtable hosted by Yukon University to discuss research and innovation in the North with local innovators.

Closed to media.

Media appearances

8:10 a.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air live on Cabin Radio.

8:20 a.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air live on CBC Radio One North.
